vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_wrparam(unsigned short FlibHndl, short length, IODBPSD *param);

cmn.p: Writes the parameter specified by "datano","type"(only for the parameter with axis). The data format depends on each parameter. The format of Byte/Word/2-Word parameter is generally signed binary.
Writes the parameter for all axes once by specifying 'ALL_AXES' in 'type'. The parameter for each axis must be stored in each array of "IODBPSD".
The attribute of CNC parameter depends on the type and axis, and it is different for each parameter. It is as follows, and can be got by cnc_rdparainfo function.

tr.td: Every bits have each definition. (each axis)
4-byte data which indicates value of variable and 4-byte data which indicates number of places of decimals are stored.

Real parameter with axis
(only Series 15i, 30i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A)
4-byte data which indicates value of variable and 4-byte data which indicates number of places of decimals are stored. (each axis)

cmn.p: It is impossible to write any bit parameter bit by bit. 8 bits(i.e. 1 byte) which belong to the same parameter number are written at the same time.

span.p: PW000 alarm(Series 15/15i, 30i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A), PS000 alarm(Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C, Power Mate i): "PLEASE TURN OFF POWER" may be issued when some specific parameters are written.
The error(Return:EW_PROT) is returned when the locked parameter such as parameter more than 9000 is written.
PW000 alarm: "PLEASE TURN OFF POWER" may be issued when some specific parameters are written.
The error(Return:EW_PROT) is returned when the locked parameter such as parameter more than 9000 is written.

cmn.p: See the "PARAMETER MANUAL" of CNC for details of each parameter.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.
Specify the data block length(size of IODBPSD structure).
In case that the size of parameter is 4 byte, the IODBPSD structure is as follows. In case that its size is 1, 2, or 8 byte, the size of data part per 1 parameter or 1 axis is 1, 2, 8 byte.
The spindle parameters have an axis attribute, and the data for number of spindle are valid.
Pointer to the IODBPSD structure including the parameter. The IODBPSD structure is as follows.

dl.dd: See the "PARAMETER MANUAL" of CNC about available parameter number. It can be got by cnc_rdparanum function and cnc_rdparainfo function.

Specify the attribute of parameter.
Series 15, 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i, 30i, Power Mate i, PMi-A Specify the axis number.
0 : no axis
1,..,m : 1 axis(m=max. controlled axes)
ALL_AXES : all axes(ALL_AXES=-1)
Series 15i Upper byte : type
0 : bit type
1 : byte type
2 : word type
3 : 2-word type
4 : real type
Lower byte : axis
0 : no axis
1,..,m : 1 axis(m=max. controlled axes)
ALL_AXES : all axes(ALL_AXES=-1)
Specify the real parameter. Specify the value of variable in prm_val, and specify the number of places of decimals in dec_val.

div.p: (Example) When the value of real parameter is 12.345, prm_val and dec_val are read as follows.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.
Specify the data block length(size of IODBPSD structure).
In case that the size of parameter is 4 byte, the IODBPSD structure is as follows. In case that its size is 1, 2, or 8 byte, the size of data part per 1 parameter or 1 axis is 1, 2, 8 byte.
The spindle parameters have an axis attribute, and the data for number of spindle are valid.
Pointer to the IODBPSD structure including the parameter. The IODBPSD structure is as follows.

dl.dd: See the "PARAMETER MANUAL" of CNC about available parameter number. It can be got by cnc_rdparanum function and cnc_rdparainfo function.

Specify the attribute of parameter.
Specify the axis number.
0 : no axis
1,..,m : 1 axis(m=max. controlled axes)
ALL_AXES : all axes(ALL_AXES=-1)
Specify the real parameter. Specify the value of variable in prm_val, and specify the number of places of decimals in dec_val.

div.p: (Example) When the value of real parameter is 12.345, prm_val and dec_val are read as follows.

item.name: EW_LENGTH
item.content:
Data block length error
Size of IODBPSD structure(length) is wrong.

item.name: EW_NUMBER
item.content:
Data number error
Parameter number(datano) is wrong.

item.name: EW_ATTRIB
item.content:
Data attribute error
Axis number(type) is wrong.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
No option
There is no option required for the specified parameter.
( Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C, Power Mate i )

item.name: EW_PASSWD
item.content:
Specified parameter cannot be written because the data is protected.
( Series 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C )

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D/F, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

option.type: Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C, Power Mate i CNC option for some specific parameters

is.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.
